name: SaveYourTeacher
description:
This game is made for Comunity Game Jam, theme: The game is a liar.

Unfortunately we did not have enough time to finish it but, one day will be finished.

This was our first GameJam and we have  learnt a lot, mainly that we need to think smaller next time.

Game design: Teodorescu Ada

Game developement: Andrei Alexandru
